name: Leech Legends
description:
Leech Legends is a Boss fight game made for a Minijam.

It Supports Controller and KBM

Music made by : https://www.bandlab.com/agent_track

Controls are ingame that are explained in the tutorial, for ease of access here they are again:

WASD/Left Stick --Move

ArrowKeys/Right Stick--Shoot

(Added the FaceButtons as Alternative Shooting Controls)

Space/Left Trigger --Dash

Shift/Right Trigger --Suck Blood

Like every gamejam game i made it was going fine until the last day where everything broke, I wanted to add more attack patterns but i ran out of time.

I Fixed some of the bugs that were the most annoying for me.
